00034 typedef struct xyt_CDT *xyt_ADT;
00035 
00036 
00037 /*************************************xyt.h************************************
00038 Function: XYT_new()
00039 
00040 Input :
00041 Output:
00042 Return: ADT ptr or NULL upon failure.
00043 Description: This function allocates and returns an xyt handle
00044 Usage: xyt_handle = xyt_new();
00045 **************************************xyt.h***********************************/
00046 extern xyt_ADT XYT_new(void);
00047 
00048 
00049 /*************************************xyt.h************************************
00050 Function: XYT_free()
00051 
00052 Input : pointer to ADT.
00053 Output:
00054 Return:
00055 Description: This function frees the storage associated with an xyt handle
00056 Usage: XYT_free(xyt_handle);
00057 **************************************xyt.h***********************************/
00058 extern int XYT_free(xyt_ADT xyt_handle);
00059 
00060 
00061 /*************************************xyt.h************************************
00062 Function: XYT_factor
00063 
00064 Input : ADT ptr,  and pointer to object
00065 Output:
00066 Return: 0 on failure, 1 on success
00067 Description: This function sets the xyt solver 
00068 
00069 xyt assumptions: given n rows of global coarse matrix (E_loc) where
00070    o global dofs N = sum_p(n), p=0,P-1 
00071    (i.e. row dist. with no dof replication)
00072    (5.21.00 will handle dif replication case)
00073    o m is the number of columns in E_loc (m>=n)
00074    o local2global holds global number of column i (i=0,...,m-1)
00075    o local2global holds global number of row    i (i=0,...,n-1)
00076    o mylocmatvec performs E_loc . x_loc where x_loc is an vector of
00077    length m in 1-1 correspondence with local2global
00078    (note that gs package takes care of communication).
00079    (note do not zero out upper m-n entries!)
00080    o mylocmatvec(void *grid_data, double *in, double *out)
00081 
00082 ML beliefs/usage: move this to to ML_XYT_factor routine
00083    o my_ml holds address of ML struct associated w/E_loc, grid_data, grid_tag
00084    o grid_tag, grid_data, my_ml used in
00085       ML_Set_CSolve(my_ml, grid_tag, grid_data, ML_Do_CoarseDirect);
00086    o grid_data used in 
00087       A_matvec(grid_data,v,u);
00088 
00089 Usage: 
00090 **************************************xyt.h***********************************/
00091 extern int XYT_factor(xyt_ADT xyt_handle,   /* prev. allocated xyt  handle */
00092                       int *local2global,    /* global column mapping       */
00093               int n,                /* local num rows              */
00094               int m,                /* local num cols              */
00095               void *mylocmatvec,    /* b_loc=A_local.x_loc         */
00096               void *grid_data       /* grid data for matvec        */
00097               );
00098 
00099 
00100 /*************************************xyt.h************************************
00101 Function: XYT_solve
00102 
00103 Input : ADT ptr, b (rhs)
00104 Output: x (soln)
00105 Return:
00106 Description: This function performs x = E^-1.b
00107 Usage: XYT_solve(xyt_handle, double *x, double *b)
00108 **************************************xyt.h***********************************/
00109 extern int XYT_solve(xyt_ADT xyt_handle, REAL *x, REAL *b);
00110

00121 extern int XYT_stats(xyt_ADT xyt_handle);
